comments:
Options to modify imported types appear in the context menu in the graphical
editor.  When some are selected errors get logged.  This is using build
I20050223. Here is how to reproduce this problem:


- create a new schema.
- Using the graphical view import catalogue.xsd (from examples)
- Create a new type "MyType"
- Drill down on this type
- add a sequence
- set the baseType of MyType to be "Publication Type"  this is imported
- the imported segments are shown in grey, but if your right click on them
options  to modify those components appear.  Since this is imported these
components shouldnt be able to be modified.  Maybe these options should be
greyed out in the context menu
- Try adding another element to the imported sequence

I get this error:
